alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 22 at 3:03AM MDT until September 22 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility under one quarter mile in dense fog. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills including Interstate 80 between Cheyenne and Laramie. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the High Wind Warning, from 3 AM to 3 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility through Thursday morning. Strong cross winds on Friday will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
